plugins.name: 切图助手 Slice Export Assistant
plugins.description:
Introduction

Slice Export Assistant is a powerful Figma plugin designed specifically for designers to efficiently export selected design elements. Whether you're working on web designs, mobile applications, or icon creation, Slice Export Assistant caters to your diverse needs.


Function Description

  1. Multiple Format Support: Export your designs in various formats including PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, and WEBP.
  2. Multi-Scale Exporting: Easily set different export scales with automatic increments to save your time.
  3. Custom Suffixes: Assign custom suffixes to each exported file to ensure consistent and organized file naming.
  4. Batch Exporting: Export multiple files at once and automatically generate a ZIP archive for easy downloading and management.
  5. WEBP Conversion: Built-in WEBP format conversion to enhance image optimization efficiency.


How to Use

  1. Select Elements: In Figma, select one or more design elements you wish to export.
  2. Run the Plugin: Right-click on the selected elements, navigate to Plugins > Slice Export Assistant > Export.


Configure Options

  1. Choose Format: Select the desired export format from PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, or WEBP.
  2. Set Scale and Suffix: Add the required export scales. Each time you click the "Add" button, the scale automatically increments.
  3. Customize Suffixes: Modify or remove suffixes as needed to fit your naming conventions.
  4. Export: Click the Export button. The plugin will export the files based on your settings—downloading single files directly or packaging multiple files into a ZIP archive for download.


Precautions

  1. Ensure Correct Selection: Make sure to select the elements you want to export on the canvas; otherwise, the plugin cannot perform the export.
  2. Browser Compatibility: WEBP format conversion relies on the browser's Canvas support. Ensure your browser is compatible.
  3. File Naming: When customizing suffixes, avoid using special characters to ensure the validity of file names.


介绍

切图助手是一款强大的Figma插件，专为设计师打造，帮助您高效地导出选中的设计元素。无论是网页设计、移动应用还是图标制作，切图助手都能满足您的多样化需求。


功能说明

  1. 多格式支持：支持导出PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF和WEBP等多种格式。
  2. 多倍数导出：轻松设置不同的导出倍数，并自动递增，节省您的时间。
  3. 自定义后缀：为每个导出文件设置自定义后缀，确保文件命名规范。
  4. 批量导出：支持一次导出多个文件，并自动生成ZIP压缩包，方便下载和管理。
  5. WEBP转换：内置WEBP格式转换功能，提升图片优化效率。


使用方法

  1. 选择元素：在Figma中选择一个或多个需要导出的设计元素。
  2. 运行插件：右键点击选择的元素，导航至Plugins > 切图助手 Slice Export Assistant > Export。


设置选项

  1. 选择格式：从PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF或WEBP中选择导出格式。
  2. 设置倍数和后缀：添加所需的导出倍数，每次点击“添加”按钮，倍数自动递增。
  3. 自定义后缀：根据需要修改或删除后缀内容。
  4. 导出：点击导出按钮，插件将根据设置导出文件，单文件直接下载，多文件打包为ZIP下载。


注意事项

  1. 确保选择正确：请先在画布上选中要导出的元素，否则插件无法执行导出操作。
  2. 浏览器支持：WEBP格式转换依赖于浏览器的Canvas支持，请确保您的浏览器兼容。
  3. 文件命名：自定义后缀时，请避免使用特殊字符，以确保文件名的有效性。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Flexible Multi-Scale Slice Exporting

plugins.name: Gradient Replacer
plugins.description:
Gradient Replacer


Helps you clean up your designs by converting gradients to solid colors with intelligent options. Perfect for simplifying designs, improving handoff, or meeting brand guidelines.


🚀 Key features:


  1. Convert all gradients on a page or just selected elements
  2. Three smart conversion options:
  3. Pick from the predefined palette
  4. Use the dominant color from each gradient
  5. Choose your own custom color
  6. Batch process multiple gradients at once
  7. Preserves original opacity values
  8. Works with all gradient types (linear, radial, angular, and diamond)


🧐 How to use:


  1. Select elements or leave unselected to process entire page
  2. Choose your preferred conversion method
  3. Click "Replace Gradients" to convert


Pro tip: Use the dominant color option to maintain the closest match to your original designs.


–––––––––––


🙌 Enjoy!

Like my stuff? Consider buying me a coffee (BMAC or Ko-fi) so I can develop more projects 😘 ☕️

accepted.description: Designer and developer who loves experimenting and creating cool things.

plugins.name: Batch Description Update
plugins.description:
Adding a description to your Figma's components brings some benefits. When it comes to icons, adding terms and tags can help users find icons in the asset panel. However, maintaining component descriptions can be a lot of work, especially for a long set of icons. This plugin allows users to update all component descriptions with three clicks.

  • Create a .CSV file where the first column is the component name and the second is the desired description;
  • Run the plugin 'Batch Description Update', select the .CSV file, and run the process;
  • Done! Your components have their descriptions updated in no time.
plugins.tagline: Update component description in batch through a .CSV file

plugins.name: Tinte
plugins.description:
Intro

Create stunning colour palettes or find perfect colour combinations especially the right shades of greys, tailor-made for every project in seconds.


Whether you're starting out, especially if you’re starting out or a seasoned pro, use Tinte to generate colours, shades and all the greys you need for your projects — websites, apps etc. 


And with Tinte, you get the Hex, HSL and RGB codes.


How to Use?

You can use Tinte in two ways;


1. If you have a base colour code, just input the colour code in to the text prompt and Tinte will do the rest.


2. If you don’t have a colour code, don’t worry, you can still use Tinte. All you have to do is provide some information about your project and Tinte will have options for you in seconds. 


Privacy

We do not retain or store your palettes. 


Support

This is the first version of Tinte, so please leave us all your feedback and support. We will appreciate it.


If you face any issues or want to request for features, please let us know in the comments or by filling this form.
plugins.tagline: Create stunning colour palettes, tailor-made for every project in seconds.

plugins.name: Fancy Text Generator
plugins.description:
✨ What It Does

The Fancy Text Generator instantly transforms your plain text into beautiful, stylized typography using Unicode characters.


Get multiple licenses ->


Perfect For

  1. Social Media Designers - Create eye-catching posts and stories
  2. UI/UX Designers - Add unique typography to interfaces
  3. Brand Designers - Develop distinctive text treatments
  4. Content Creators - Make text that stands out
  5. Anyone who wants to make their text more interesting!


⚡ Key Features

  1. 75+ Text Transformations
  2. Classic Styles: Old English, Medieval, Cursive, Bold, Italic
  3. Unicode Magic: Circles, Squares, Bubbles, Strikethrough
  4. Creative Effects: Upside-down, Mirror, Creepy/Glitch text
  5. Fun Styles: Cute text with emojis, Vaporwave aesthetic
  6. Mathematical: Subscript, Superscript, Double-struc
  7. And many more!


Seamless Figma Integration

  1. Real-time Preview - See transformations as you type
  2. One-Click Insert - Add text directly to your canvas
  3. Smart Font Detection - Automatically finds the best font for each style
  4. Perfect Positioning - Text appears centered in your viewport


Instant Results

  1. Type once, get 75+ variations instantly
  2. No font files to download or install
  3. Works with any text in any language
  4. Fast performance


How It Works

  1. Type Your Text - Enter any text in the input field
  2. Browse Styles - Instantly see 75+ fancy variations
  3. Insert to Figma - Click any style to add it to your canvas
  4. Copy text - Click to copy the generated text
  5. Customize - Adjust size, color, and positioning as needed in Figma


💡 Use Cases

  1. Social Media: 𝒴𝑜𝓊𝓇 𝒷𝓇𝒶𝓃𝒹 𝒽𝑒𝓇𝑒 for Instagram bios and posts
  2. Gaming: 🅶🅰🅼🅴🆁 🆃🅰🅶 for Twitch overlays and gaming content
  3. Branding: 𝔜𝔬𝔲𝔯 ℭ𝔬𝔪𝔭𝔞𝔫𝔶 for unique logo treatments
  4. Fun Projects: 🐙😎 ƈяαzу тєχт 🌷🐙 for creative designs


🎨 Sample Transformations

From "Hello World" to:

𝓗𝓮𝓵𝓵𝓸 𝓦𝓸𝓻𝓵𝓭 (Cursive)

🅷🅴🅻🅻🅾 🆆🅾🆁🅻🅳 (Squared)

ʜᴇʟʟᴏ ᴡᴏʀʟᴅ (Small Caps)

H⃣e⃣l⃣l⃣o⃣ W⃣o⃣r⃣l⃣d⃣ (Circled)

𝒽𝑒𝓁𝓁𝑜 𝓌𝑜𝓇𝓁𝒹 (Script)

🐙💜 ɦ𝔢𝓵𝓵𝓸 山𝓸ⓡⓛđ 🐣💚 (Crazy Style)


Technical Details

  1. Not all charachters are compatible with Figma's text system
  2. Automatic font optimization for Unicode characters
  3. Real-time text transformation engine

plugins.name: GradientForge - Free mesh gradients
plugins.description:
This tool allows you to create beautiful mesh gradients with customizable color points. You can:

  1. Add and remove color points
  2. Adjust colors using the color picker
  3. Change the aspect ratio
  4. Save your gradients as PNG files

The gradients are generated using WebGL and RBF interpolation for smooth performance and high-quality output.

plugins.name: Multi Text Edit
plugins.description:
Edit multiple text elements in a single text editor


Very helpful for bulk text editing, or ask an LLM for a list of dummy content to paste into the text editor.


Docs

  1. Update Text - each line of the text editor a selected text node in the selected X, Y, or Z order. Shortcut: press Cmd+Enter/Ctrl+Enter while in the typing to 'Update Text.'
  2. Pull Text - fills the text editor with the content of the selected text elements, so you can edit existing text and update it.
  3. Left to Right (X) - fills the leftmost text elements first. Falls back to 'Top to Bottom (Y)' if X values are equal.
  4. Top to Bottom (Y) - fills the topmost text elements first. Falls back to 'Left to Right (X)' if Y values are equal.
  5. Layer order (Z) - fills text elements in the order they appear in the Layers panel.


Tip: Precisely select nested text elements using "Ctrl+Click Drag" to draw a box through a set of text elements. See Figma Docs "Selection Marquee 4." for details.


This plugin was inspired by Multiple Text Editor's "List to Layers" functionality. You might try this other plugin if you'd like to generate random content for text elements in a similar way.


Github Repo
plugins.tagline: Edit multiple text elements in a single text editor

plugins.name: scale_One-click adaptation to device screen
plugins.description:
This plug-in can help designers adapt their designs to devices of different sizes with one click.


1. Automatic layout adjustment:

Automatically adjust left and right and top and bottom layouts according to different size ratios

- Automatically detect horizontal or vertical layout direction

- Adjust element spacing and padding according to layout direction

- Maintain the overall structure and visual balance of the design


2. Intelligent size detection and customization:

- Analyze all design draft sizes on the current page

- Identify the most commonly used sizes and recommend them to users

- Built-in common device sizes (iPhone, iPad, Web, etc.)

- Support adding custom sizes, customizable names and sizes


3. One-click export:

After generating the manuscript, you can export all illustrations with one click and add size information to the name

- Automatically set export options, including size information

- Support batch export of all adapted design drafts

- Automatically include size information in file naming for easy management


该插件可以帮助设计师一键将设计稿适配到不同尺寸的设备上。


1. 自动调整布局：

根据不同的尺寸比例自动调整左右和上下布局

- 自动检测水平或垂直布局方向

- 根据布局方向调整元素间距和内边距

- 保持设计的整体结构和视觉平衡


2. 尺寸智能检测与自定义：

- 分析当前页面中的所有设计稿尺寸

- 识别最常用的尺寸并推荐给用户

- 内置常见设备尺寸（iPhone、iPad、Web等）

- 支持添加自定义尺寸，可自定义名称和尺寸大小


3. 一键导出：

生成稿件后可以一键导出所有配图并在命名中加入尺寸信息

- 自动设置导出选项，包含尺寸信息

- 支持批量导出所有适配后的设计稿

- 文件命名中自动包含尺寸信息，方便管理
plugins.tagline: Ability to scale designs to multiple sizes, and lock scaling rules for design elements

plugins.name: UIDraft: Material Preview
plugins.description:
Live Web Preview for Figma

See your designs come alive in real web environments – directly within Figma.


Functional Overview

  1. View Figma frame/group/components as they’ll appear in actual browsers
  2. Auto-converts Figma styles to CSS custom properties hierarchy


How to Use

  1. Choose any frame/group/component node in your Figma file


Operational Constraints

  1. Backgrounds using Figma's CROP fill mode might display unexpected aspect ratios
  2. Complex boolean operations may simplify during web preview rendering
  3. Any layer with rotation ≠0° may render with unexpected alignment.

コメントが溢れてしまったプロジェクトで

必要なコメントだけをピックアップして残したいときに、コメントのリンクをメモして整理できます。


ページ数が多いプロジェクトで

後回しにした作業場所をすぐに見つけたいときに、その場所のリンクをメモしておけます。


他の人からまとめてリンクを共有されたとき

コメントやフレームのリンクをこのメモに貼り付けておけば、クリック一つでその場所にスムーズに移動できます。外部メモやチャットからFigma内リンクを開くと、ブラウザを経由して遅れることが多いですが、このプラグインならタイムラグなしで移動可能です。特にクライアントに画面共有しながら説明する際などに便利です。

CSS Token Generator Usage


Pre-requisite

You should have style created for all colors that you want to use in the project

You should use the following naming convention to assign style property to your colors

E.g.: 'Primary', 'Brand', 'Primary/100', 'Brand/title black 100'``


# Running Plugin

- Go to the Figma design file where you want to use the plugin

- Use `CMD + p` to open quick menu

- Search for new plugins using "Find More plugins option" and search for "Reablocks Figma Plugin"

- Once found, click on run plugin, it will open a popup

- Click on "Generate CSS"

- Click on "Copy CSS"

- Use the copied CSS tokens to your project


Development guide

Check the readme file @ https://github.com/reaviz/reablocks-figma-plugin/blob/main/README.md for dev contribution guidelines

plugins.name: Layer Duplicator Pro
plugins.description:
Layer Duplicator Pro


Layer Duplicator Pro is an innovative plugin for Figma designed to streamline the process of duplicating and modifying design layers using data from Excel spreadsheets. Whether you're managing complex design projects or iterating on prototypes, this tool enhances efficiency and accuracy by integrating structured data seamlessly into your Figma workspace.


Main Features:

  1. Effortless Integration: Import data directly from Excel into Figma to duplicate layers and apply modifications swiftly.
  2. Structured Data Handling: Manage detailed information about design layers through Excel, ensuring precise replication and edits.
  3. Visual Representation: Review and validate changes clearly within Figma, enhancing collaboration and decision-making.
  4. Enhanced Workflow: Optimize design iterations by leveraging Excel's organizational capabilities directly within Figma.


How to Use:

  1. Download Data: Extract specific details from layers into an Excel file. First, select the layer you wish to duplicate. An Excel file with the necessary structure will be automatically generated and downloaded.
  2. Import and Duplicate: Once the automatically generated Excel file has been downloaded, generate rows corresponding to each element that will be duplicated based on the selected layer. You can modify these elements by editing the corresponding columns in the Excel file. Layer Duplicator Pro will automatically adjust the indicated parameters and create a duplicated layer with the desired dimensions.
  3. Review Results: Efficiently validate changes and errors through intuitive visual feedback within Figma.


Benefits:

  1. Increased Productivity: Simplify complex design tasks and accelerate project timelines.
  2. Improved Collaboration: Foster better teamwork by visualizing changes and updates clearly.
  3. Streamlined Processes: Eliminate manual duplication efforts and streamline iterative design workflows.


Next Steps:

Explore how Layer Duplicator Pro can revolutionize your design process by integrating structured data seamlessly from Excel into Figma. Enhance productivity and creativity with a tool designed to simplify and elevate your design workflow.
plugins.tagline: Duplicate, resize, edit text & images swiftly in Figma for streamlined design workflows.

plugins.name: BringEase
plugins.description:
<ENGLISH>

Transform text into data more easily than ever with the “BringEase plugin”.


If you use BringEase, you no longer need to manually create design text in XML or Json.


“Just select and extract”


The most complete collaboration plugin for designers and developers, it dramatically saves your work time.


BringEase is free to use for both commercial and personal projects.

Have fun! ✌️


Designed and developed by I M fine inc.



Version History Version 1.0 (*First edition)

- Name, FontSize, Text can be converted to XML, Json, XLSX

- Search by name or word

- Data format can be modified


Here we are releasing the first beta version with some features for testing and feedback purposes. We evolve every day to provide you with the best version of our products to make your work easier.


-------------------------------------------------


<KOREAN>

"BringEase 플러그인"을 통해 무엇보다 쉽게 텍스트를 data화 해보세요.


BringEase를 사용하면 더이상 일일히 디자인상의 텍스트를 직접 XML이나 Json등으로 만들 필요가 없습니다.


"선택하고 뽑아내기만 하세요"


디자이너와 개발자를 위한 가장 완벽한 협업플러그인으로 여러분의 작업시간을 획기적으로 절약시켜줍니다.


BringEase는 상업용 및 개인 프로젝트 모두에 자유롭게 사용할 수 있습니다.


재미있게 보내세요! ✌️


Designed and developed by I M fine inc.



버전 기록 버전 1.0 (*초판)

- Name, FontSize, Text를 XML, Json, XLSX 로 변환가능

- 이름 또는 단어로 검색

- Data 포멧 수정가능


테스트 및 피드백 목적으로 일부 기능을 갖춘 첫 번째 베타 버전을 출시합니다. 우리는 나날이 발전하여 귀하가 쉽게 작업을 할 수 있도록 최고의 제품 버전을 제공합니다.

  3. Check the current download status.
  4. Download each image individually

plugins.name: DesignDetox
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma experience with DesignDetox – the ultimate tool for decluttering and optimizing your design workspace. Our plugin is engineered to enhance the efficiency of designers by providing a swift and seamless way to manage and organize your Figma files.


Key Features:

  • Detach Instances and Components: Simplify your designs by detaching all instances and components with just a click. Perfect for finalizing designs or preparing files for handoff.
  • Remove Auto-Layouts: Instantly strip away auto-layout properties from selected frames, allowing for more flexible manipulation and customization of your designs.
  • Eliminate Hidden Layers: Clean up your workspace by removing all hidden layers from the entire page. A great way to reduce file size and improve manageability.


DesignDetox is more than just a plugin; it's your personal assistant for maintaining a clean and efficient design environment. With its intuitive interface and powerful features, DesignDetox is an indispensable tool for every Figma user looking to enhance productivity and focus on creativity.


Easy to Use:

  • Simple, user-friendly interface with clear, actionable buttons.
  • Real-time updates on the count of instances/components, auto-layout frames, and hidden layers in your project.
  • Instant notifications provide feedback on actions taken for transparency and control.


Whether you're a seasoned designer or just starting out, DesignDetox helps you maintain a clutter-free workspace, enabling you to focus on what truly matters – creating stunning designs. Try DesignDetox today and experience a cleaner, more efficient design process in Figma!

plugins.name: Iconsynx
plugins.description:
ICONSYNX plugin converts SVG icons into WebFonts (.woff2, .ttf, .eot) with seamless React, Vue, and TypeScript integration. Easily generate custom icon fonts, automate GitHub PR creation, and streamline your workflow. Perfect for teams managing CSS-based icon fonts while working with modern JavaScript frameworks.


Privacy Note:

To enable GitHub PR automation, this plugin requires access to your GitHub repository via a personal access token (GitHub token). The token is used only for creating pull requests and is stored securely. No sensitive data is collected or shared.


🔹 Key Features:

✅ Convert Figma SVGs to WebFonts (.woff2, .ttf, .eot)

✅ One-click WebFont generation for seamless icon management

✅ React & Vue support for easy integration in frontend projects

✅ TypeScript compatibility for strongly-typed icon components

✅ Automated GitHub PRs to update icon sets effortlessly

✅ Optimized font bundles to reduce file size and improve performance
plugins.tagline: Convert SVG icons into WebFonts with GitHub PR automation & React, Vue, TypeScript support.

  2. Enter in your OpenAI token so that you only pay for what you generate (around $0.01 for every 10 generations)


🆓 Free to use, but pay for ChatGPT API usage:

  1. While this plugin is 100% free, you'll need to pay for any OpenAI or ChatGPT requests made by the plugin


🛟 Feedback:

  1. We'd love any ideas or questions you have: feedback@berryplugins.com
  2. Leave a comment if you want to tell people how great this plugin is

plugins.name: Clean layers
plugins.description:
With Clean layers, you're able to find unnamed layers, components, and stray instances (which are component instances that no longer have a parent component), helping you maintain a clean file that's properly organized and synced.


This makes your design workflow smoother and ensures your files are easy to navigate and collaborate on.
plugins.tagline: A Figma plugin that helps clean up your layers and components.
